Paragraph.Text: Located less than a mile from Clapham Junction train station and 1.2 miles from Parsons Green, the London Battersea Hotel is ideal for those wishing to stay close to the hub of London city and explore everything the region has to offer. You might like to enjoy a picnic on Clapham Common on a sunny day, located 1.5 miles away, or visit Battersea – an area of London lying on the South Bank of the River Thames. Football fans can take a trip to Stamford Bridge, located just 1.1 miles away, the home of 2012 Champions League winners Chelsea Football Club. If you’re more of a tennis fan then this hotel is also a very convenient choice, as it is situated just 4.5 miles from Wimbledon, making it the perfect place to stay for those wishing to attend the famous tennis championships. The hotel has our fresh new look and features Travelodges new room design complete with Dreamer Bed so you can be sure of a great night's sleep. Nearest airport - heathrow 16 m, 25 KM nearest city - london 5 m, 8 KM www.Travelodge.Co.Uk -Safety and security facilities: -safety and security facilities: all travelodges conform to local fire and safety regulations.All rooms have smoke detectors fitted. Paragraph.Text: Contemporary luxury meets English Charm at the Stoke Place Hotel. Each room provides its own touch of luxury and features a modern contemporary design. British food created with the best quality and locally sourced ingredients are served in the exquisite restaurant. The rich and charming ambience of the hotel is the perfect setting for your celebration.

BasicPropertyInfo.HotelAmenity: Wireless internet connection in public areas

Paragraph.Text: Whether you are traveling for business, pleasure or planning a meeting, marriott focuses on what it takes to make your trip successful. Enjoy the comfort of one of our 390 guest rooms, each equipped with remote-control tv, phones with voice mail and stsn-high speed internet access. Start your day with a complimentary newspaper and morning coffee, in the comfort of your own room. Or sample the many tasteful options we offer in our 5 restaurants, lounges and bars. Experience a refreshing change of pace in our health club including a sauna, steam room, indoor heated pool andgymnasium. Your business objectives and flight patterns will be kept on course through our business centre, executive lounge, and early arrivals & departures lounge accessible 24 hours a day. The london heathrow marriott is a deluxe internationl airport hotel dedicated to providing 'first class' accommodation with exceptional caring service. Paragraph.Text: Ibis Hotel Heathrow is 1.2 miles from T1,2,3&4, and 4 miles from T5. The Hoppa bus goes every 20min to & from airport costing £5; take H6 from T1/2/3 or H56 from T4/5. Free local buses from Heathrow Central to Harlington Corner which is 2 min walk to hotel (bus 105/111/140). Central London is 15min by train on Heathrow Express or 45min on Tube. Guests driving must register car at reception as we operate a ticketless carpark using ANPR cameras; parking £12 per day. Please use UB35AN for Satnav

Paragraph.Text:
Village Farnborough is one of the unique landmark Black Box designs led by a new generation of Village Urban Resorts. Each room at this modern - sleek and stylish hotel is contemporary in design and extremely comfortable and comes equipped with a super-comfy Sealy bed - ultra modern en-suite - flat screen TV - in-room climate control - hospitality tray and free wi-fi throughout.
As a guest you get totally unrestricted access to all of our leisure club facilities at Velocity Health and Fitness. For those looking to feel the burn we have the latest state-of-the-art gym equipment and a 20m heated indoor swimming pool for swimmers after some serious lengths. You will find saunas - whirlpool spa and a steam room to relax and unwind from the hustle and bustle of modern life.
When it comes to dining Village Farnborough has a variety of options to suit all tastes and budgets. Guests can enjoy open theatre dining at Victory Chop and Ale House serving tasty steaks - great seafood and ales. Of course - you need a great wine list to complement our great food and we have everything from the easy drinking to the rich and complex. If it is hearty pub grub - a great pint and live sports you are after - you will find a Victory Pub and Kitchen in every Village Urban Resort. We do great deals too. Every week - we run specials not on the menu or exclusive events. The hotel has an on-site Starbucks Coffee Shop offering a great selection of drinks and snacks in relaxed surroundings and a great place to catch up with friends and family.
Enjoy the wonderful amenities and great service at the Village Urban Resort Farnborough. -Url:www.Village-hotels.Co.Uk . - Fab-farnborough airport . . . .2.0 MI- 3.2 KM - lhr-heathrow airport . . . . . 26.0 MI- 41.8 KM - sou-eastleigh . . . . . . . . .46.0 MI- 74.0 KM - downtown ......................0.3 MI- 0.4 KM -property description- village urban resorts are ideally placed modern hotels in every big city across the uk and are easily accessible by air - rail and all major road networks. They offer both the business and leisure traveller everything under one roof - uber chic and stylish bedrooms - dedicated meeting and conference facilities - state of the art health and fitness - a fantastic choice of dining - a real pub - an onsite starbucks - complimentary wi-fi throughout the hotel and free parking. They are well placed for the motorway network and regional airports and close to major towns and cities located just off the m3 motorway and only 1 mile from farnborough airport and rail station. Village farnborough is just 38 minutes to london waterloo by train close and to the m25 and m4. . There are many areas of interest surrounding village farnborough if you are after culture arts or some history and local sightseeing. Embrace the culture at windsor castle - shop till you drop at kingsmead and keep active at legoland. Paragraph.Text: Positioned 2.8 miles from Camberley Railway Station and 7.8 miles from the renowned Ascot Racecourse, Frimley Hotel is the ideal place to stay in this quaint English town. Those wanting a relaxing break can unwind at Camberley Heath Golf Club, located just half a mile away. Alternatively, families looking for a more fun-packed time can enjoy a day out at Legoland, home to a variety of unique rides and interactive activities, or Thorpe Park, where you can jump aboard a range of thrilling rollercoasters, both under 15 miles from Frimley. Nearest airport - heathrow - 24 miles / 38 KM nearest city - london - 30 miles - 48 KM www.Travelodge.Co.Uk All travelodges conform to local fire and safety regulations.All rooms have smoke detectors fitted. Paragraph.Text: Offering great transport links and many local attractions, London Clapham Junction Hotel is the perfect place to stay when visiting the wider London area. This hotel is very close to the Clapham Junction train station which offers easy links in, out and around London. If you want fresh air and open space, the famous Clapham Common can also be found under a mile away. Shopaholics will enjoy a visit to Earls Court or the West End, both under 6 miles away. Football fans have plenty of choice with both Stamford Bridge Chelsea FC and Craven Cottage Fulham FC within easy distance. Art lovers will find London Clapham Hotel ideal too as Brixton Academy and The National Gallery are both nearby. This is a new hotel and has recently been updated with our fresh new look and features Travelodge’s new room design complete with Dreamer Bed so you can be sure of a great night’s sleep Nearest airport - heathrow 17 miles / 27.3 KM nearest city - london 4.5 miles / 7.2 KM www.Travelodge.Co.Uk All travelodges conform to local fire and safety regulations.All rooms have smoke detectors fitted. Paragraph.Text: This is a very comfortable 3 star hotel which has 68 en-suite and air conditioned bedrooms, which is only 9 miles from Heathrow Airport and 13 miles from Central London. The hotel restaurant - The Bistro serves a wide selection of Modern English dishes. The hotel has a traditional English pub serving a range of Young’s ales and excellent bar food. Surrounded by an excellent road and rail network to the Bridge Hotel is easy to reach - ideal for reaching the local business community and for the leisure traveler. Our local business community includes IBM, Glaxo SmithKline,Gallaher International, Tetley, Wincanton Logistics and Ultra Electronics to name but a few. We are also an excellent venue for that small meeting or larger conference of up to 80 delegates. -Eml:bridgehotel@youngs.Co.Uk -url:www.Thebridgehotel.Com . - Lhr-heathrow airport . . . . . . 8.4 MI-13.5 KM - downtown . . . . . . . . . . . .11.2 MI-18.0 KM -property description- the bridge hotel combines modern well equipped facilities with tradition in an ideal location. Superb for leisure and conferences. With 68 en suite bedrooms numerous function rooms and wifi available in all areas the bridge is the perfect venue for business conferences wedding receptions and civil wedding ceremonies. Add all this to the excellent service provided by dedicated and friendly staff at the bridge we think you will have found the perfect venue for all your needs. Attractions - wembley stadium . . . . . . . . . 4.0 MI-6.5km location description ideally situated only minutes from wembley stadium and 15 minutes from heathrow yet still only 20 minutes by tube from the heart of london the bridge hotel offers an ideal combination of convenience and comfort. -Safety compliant - fema identification - . Paragraph.Text: Located just a short walk from Kingston train station and 12 miles from Heathrow Airport, the London Kingston Upon Thames Hotel is an ideal option for visitors seeking accommodation close to both rail and air links. Families looking for a fun day out can take a trip to Chessington World of Adventures, 4.9 miles away, which is full of thrilling rides for all ages while Kew Gardens, one of the world’s most famous gardens, is also nearby. Car fanatics will love the Mercedes-Benz World at Brooklands, found only 11 miles away. Those looking for hotels near Twickenham Stadium and Museum will also find London Kingston Upon Thames a top choice with the site just 4.5 miles away, making this hotel perfect for those wishing to attend a game or immerse themselves in the vibrancy of the English capital. The hotel has recently been updated with our fresh new look and features Travelodge’s new room design complete with Dreamer Bed so you can be sure of a great night’s sleep. Nearest airport heathrow 10 miles nearest town - kingston - 0.75 miles www.Travelodge.Co.Uk All travelodges conform to local fire and safety regulations.All rooms have smoke detectors fitted. Paragraph.Text: Jetting off or flying in? Wherever you're heading, you'll find Premier Inn Hotel Heathrow Bath Road a handy launch pad. And with great transport links and the Heathrow Express Rail just minutes away, you'll be well placed for business and leisure destinations throughout London too. If you've time to stop and explore, plan a big adventure at Legoland. Cheer on your team at Twickenham Stadium. Or head for high-adrenalin thrills and spills at Thorpe Park. Then come back to earth at our tasty restaurant, and unwind in your spacious room and extra-comfy bed. Paragraph.Text: Upon arrival, guests are warmly welcomed by the attentive staff at the Hotel Avon. The well-appointed rooms exude a cosy English flair and are decked out in nice bedspreads and elegant carpets. In the atmospheric lobby with open fireplace, guests can sink in the comfortable leather loungers and plan their itinerary. A breakfast buffet is laid out every morning.
